title: 1818 Newsroom
overview: Recently graduated, Yao Fa started working as a trainee reporter for the "1818" program, determined to pursue genuine journalism. However, during interviews, he encountered various eccentric characters and situations. Under the guidance of seasoned journalist Wei Lai, he navigated a series of absurd yet humorous public interest stories. Through these experiences, Yao Fa gradually understood the core values and responsibilities of a public interest journalist, resolutely moving towards his dreams.
